UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Oncocin (VDKPPYLPRPRPPRRIYNR-NH2): a novel antibacterial peptide optimized against gram-negative human pathogens.
Literature.Author: Knappe D, Piantavigna S, Hansen A, Mechler A, Binas A, Nolte O, Martin LL, Hoffmann R

Literature.Title: Chemical modifications of short antimicrobial peptides from insects and vertebrates to fight multi-drug resistant bacteria.
Literature.Author: Knappe D, Stegemann C, Nimptsch A, Kolobov A Jr, Korableva E, Shamova O, Kokryakov VN, Hoffmann R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli BL21AI(MIC=64µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 10240(MIC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli DSM 10233(MIC=>125µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus DSM 1790(MIC=15.6µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis DSM 347(MIC=>125µg/ml)
